###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlMonthCal_GetFirstDOWStr

###Description###
Retrieves the first day of the week as a string

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiMonthCal.au3>
_GUICtrlMonthCal_GetFirstDOWStr($hWnd)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to control
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: One of the following values:

	Monday
	Tuesday
	Wednesday
	Thursday
	Friday
	Saturday
	Sunday

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlMonthCal_GetFirstDOW
